Title: LoveWorld Radio
Description: LoveWorld Radio is a unique arm of Christ Embassy dedicated to ensuring that the light of salvation and God's hope is taken to peoples around the world via the Radio Networks, Internet and Mobile platforms.

Title: Fresh 105.9 FM
Description: Ibadan-based Fresh FM (Ayefele Fresh FM) is an internet radio station from Ibadan, Nigeria, providing Community News, Information and Entertainment to the Nigerian Diaspora.The station is a sure stop sweet music from pre-releases to current top of the charts songs, alternative music, soft rock, old skool, RnB, best of reggae etc.

Title: Nigeria Info FM 95.1 Abuja
Description: Nigeria Info FM, Your #1 Talk, News and Sports Station!”, the first station in its format in Nigeria. It proudly broadcasts local and international news with a blend of talk & sports shows, while addressing current affairs and topical issues.

Description: Nigeria Info FM, Your #1 Talk, News and Sports Station!”, the first station in its format in Nigeria. It proudly broadcasts local and international news with a blend of talk & sports shows, while addressing current affairs and topical issues.

Title: Wazobia FM 94.1 Port Harcourt
Description: Wazobia FM is the Ogbonge Station that brings to you a vibrant blend of indigenous artists from all over the African continent. This musical background is infused with global and national news, topical issues, sports, interviews, games and entertainment gist, all delivered in PIDGIN.

Title: Wazobia FM 99.5 Abuja
Description: Wazobia FM, “The People’sStation”, ranked #1 radio station all over Nigeria, brings you a vibrant blend of indigenous artists from all over the African continent. Wazobia’s musical and comical background is infused with global and national news, topical issues, sports, interviews, games and entertainment gists, all delivered in PIDGIN.

Title: Naija Gbedu Radio
Description: NaijaGbedu is home to everything entertainment & Pan African. The #1 urban outlet responsible for breaking the latest premiere music videos, exclusive artists . Naija Gbedu was born on the 24th of January 2005 as an Entertainment platform – Today we are www.NaijaGbedu.com We aspire to be Africa’s Number 1 music, style, movie, Television and beauty website. An inspiring and informative entertainment portal !

Title: Liveway Radio Network 107.9 FM
Description: Welcome to Liveway Radio. This is your 24 hours non-stop Christian Radio Station. Liveway will help you stay spiritually fit and up to date in your walk with the Lord.     Take advantage of this reach to spread the Gospel with Liveway by sharing and introducing all your friends so that we can all together win the Kingdom for our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.  Share the links for download of our free Apps for iOS devices, Androids and other smart phones. God Bless you. Keep listening to Liveway.

Title: FRCN Radio Nigeria
Description: Commissioned as Radio Kaduna in 1962, the present Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria Kaduna, otherwise known as Radio Nigeria Kaduna has the highest audience than any Radio Station in black Africa.

Title: Space 90.1 FM

Title: 234Radio
Description: 234Radio redefines radio broadcasting with a mix of DJs touch to quality radio programming, bringing unparalleled entertainment to you on the go, without geographical barrier. With a mix of Alternative Music, Blues, Classical Music, Country Music, Electronic Music, Afro Beat, Afro Pop, Hip Hop/Rap, Inspirational, Jazz, Reggae, R&B/Soul and many more
